descriptions: Does not identify any of the author's claims or ideas.
Identifies an author's claim with significant inaccuracies.
Identifies an author's claim, but it lacks detail or has minor inaccuracies.
Identifies an author's main claim, though some nuances may be missing.
Accurately identifies the author's main claim and some supporting ideas.
Accurately identifies the author's central claim and key supporting ideas with precision.
Shows no understanding of how sentences develop claims.
Attempts to analyze sentences but demonstrates a lack of comprehension.
Offers a superficial analysis of how sentences contribute to the author's ideas.
Analyzes how some sentences develop the author's ideas, but the explanation is not thorough.
Explains how specific sentences develop the author's claim with relevant details.
Provides a detailed and insightful analysis of how specific sentences develop and refine the author's claims.
Shows no understanding of how paragraphs develop claims.
Attempts to analyze paragraphs but demonstrates a lack of comprehension.
Offers a superficial analysis of how paragraphs contribute to the author's ideas.
Analyzes how some paragraphs develop the author's ideas, but the explanation is not thorough.
Explains how specific paragraphs develop the author's claim with relevant details.
Provides a detailed and insightful analysis of how specific paragraphs develop and refine the author's claims.
Does not address the use of any text features.
Mentions text features but does not explain their purpose or effect.
Identifies some text features (e.g., headers, captions) but offers little analysis of their function.
Describes the function of some text features, but lacks in-depth analysis.
Analyzes how text features contribute to the development or refinement of ideas.
Provides a comprehensive analysis of how text features enhance the clarity and impact of the author's ideas.
